name: 2D Galaxy Shooter (thestreetdev)
description:
Battle through a never ending swarm of enemy ships with a variety of weapons! Post your highest score in the comments along with any feedback you may have.

This game is still under development and will continue to change.

Future additions will include more challenging enemies, boss battles, new powerups and more...

Controls

Movement - WASD or arrow keys

Shoot - Space or Left-Click

Thruster Speed Boost - Hold Left-Shift

v1.2

Altered background effects based on feedback

v1.1

Minor UI fix

v1.0

Initial upload
